Text GCN.from sentence: Text GCN performs the best and significantly outperforms all baseline models ( p < 0.05 based on student t- test ) on four datasets , which showcases the effectiveness of the proposed method on long text datasets .

LSTM - based models.from sentence: Similarly , LSTM - based models also rely on pre-trained word embeddings and tend to perform better when documents are shorter .

comparable results.from sentence: PV - DBOW achieves comparable results to strong baselines on 20 NG and Ohsumed , but the results on shorter text are clearly inferior to others .

worse.from sentence: PV - DM performs worse than PV - DBOW , the only comparable results are on MR , where word orders are more essential .

Graph - CNN models.from sentence: Graph - CNN models also show competitive performances .

pre-trained Glo Ve word embeddings.from sentence: When pre-trained Glo Ve word embeddings are provided , CNN performs much better , especially on Ohsumed and 20 NG .
